unit.cpp:define: #define SET_SRC_DST_3_REGS(op) CREATE_SRC_DST_3 (op);(op)->dst->reg = r_reg_get (anal->reg, REG (0), R_REG_TYPE_GPR);(op)->src[0]->reg = r_reg_get (anal->reg, REG (1), R_REG_TYPE_GPR);(op)->src[1]->reg = r_reg_get (anal->reg, REG (2), R_REG_TYPE_GPR);

#define SET_SRC_DST_3_IMM(op) CREATE_SRC_DST_3 (op);(op)->dst->reg = r_reg_get (anal->reg, REG (0), R_REG_TYPE_GPR);(op)->src[0]->reg = r_reg_get (anal->reg, REG (1), R_REG_TYPE_GPR);(op)->src[1]->imm = IMM (2);
#define SET_SRC_DST_2_REGS(op) CREATE_SRC_DST_2 (op);(op)->dst->reg = r_reg_get (anal->reg, REG (0), R_REG_TYPE_GPR);(op)->src[0]->reg = r_reg_get (anal->reg, REG (1), R_REG_TYPE_GPR);
#define SET_SRC_DST_3_REG_OR_IMM(op) if (OPERAND(2).type == RISCV_OP_IMM) {SET_SRC_DST_3_IMM (op);} else if (OPERAND(2).type == RISCV_OP_REG) {SET_SRC_DST_3_REGS (op);}
